ygData.subject: Re: Kedge Keep
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been living in KEdge Keep for at least a dozen levels with my druid, and hitting it with my bard whenever Cauldron Boil was up. This is the same strategy
ygData.messageBody:
I've been living in KEdge Keep for at least a dozen levels with my druid,
and hitting it with my bard whenever Cauldron Boil was up. This is the same
strategy we (and everyone) should use. Don't wait for EB to flash.

Finally! After killing him I don't know how many time (15?) I got me
kedgemail gauntlets! Jeez, HH helms dropping like candy, but took forever
for those stupid gloves to drop.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
50th Bard
Stace Stormraven
48th Druid
Hoozya Daddee
12th Rogue
Veeshan Server


>From: <kim@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kedge Keep
>Date: Tue, 8 Feb 2000 13:10:15 -0500 (EST)
>
>On Tue, 8 Feb 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
> >
> > Each group should have a designated EB person. And that person needs to
>be
> > *reminded* to be ready to cast EB on people who get ressed back in.
>
>We just have the EBer cast at :00, :20, and :40 after the
>hour. Make sure each group also has a secondary source of EB
>in case the main dies or goes linkdead.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
